reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 433/00: LEGISLATIVE GRANTS - TRANSPORTATION SUPPLEMENT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 433/00: LEGISLATIVE GRANTS - TRANSPORTATION SUPPLEMENT

content.content: 1. A district school board shall be paid the amount set out in Column 2 of the Table opposite the name of the board in Column 1 of the Table, as a transportation supplement. O. Reg. 433/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A district school board shall be paid the amount set out in Column 2 of the Table opposite the name of the board in Column 1 of the Table, as a transportation supplement. O. Reg. 433/00, s. 1.

content.content:
